sed命令

一个命令替换所有当前目录下的.repo/manifests/.git/config中的字符串 

sed -i "s-git://192.167.100.232/platform/manifest.git-git@192.167.100.232:platform/manifest.git-" */.repo/manifests/.git/config

sed 命令的s后可以跟任意字符代替。所以上面命令也可以写成 

sed -i "s+git://192.167.100.232/platform/manifest.git+git@192.167.100.232:platform/manifest.git+" */.repo/manifests/.git/config
